heading: Router configuration wizard
intro: This wizard helps to configure your Freifunk router.

password.label: New router password
password.error.minLength: A password must have at least 6 characters.

routerLocation.headline: Router location
routerLocation.help: If your provide the location data for your router it will be visible in our Freifunk map. You can either enter your address or drag the map pointer to the correct location.

internetSharing.headline: Internet sharing
internetSharing.shareInternet.label: Share internet
internetSharing.help: THANK YOU! You decided to share your internet connection. To protect yourself from Störerhaftung you should use VPN.

generateCertificate.label: Generate new VPN03 certificate and key for this router
generateCertificate.certificate.label: VPN certificate
generateCertificate.key.label: VPN key

ip.headline: IP addresses
ip.help: Enter the IPs you registered before. If you want the IPs registered automatically select the checkox above.
ip.register.label: Register new IP addresses

meshViaLAN.help: Your selected Mesh via LAN. This means you can connect your router to other devices that are able to mesh. For more information on meshing see here.
meshViaLAN.label: Mesh via LAN

lanip.help: Enter the IP you want to use for Mesh on LAN. If you deselect the checkox the lan ports are handled as normal router clients
lanip.label: LAN Mesh-IPv4

distribute.label: Distribute client IP addresses
distribute.help: By default the router connects to other routers that provide IP addresses. So if you see no other router or want to distribute IPs keep in mind how many clients you expect.

advancedWifi.headline: Advanced wifi options
advancedWifi.help: By default your router is configured to mesh automatically. But here you can configure to connect to an access point or be an access point yourself. You can scan for other wifi nodes and select them for connections.
advancedWifi.channel.label: Channel

filter.label: Filter SSID by
filter.noresult: No scan results match the filter {{filter}}!

configIncorrect: The data you entered is invalid. Please correct them before saving.
